Text: Under the African Centres of Excellence Impact Project, Government will shortly access Twelve Million US Dollars (US$12,000,000), for infrastructure and capacity development.
Cause: Under the African Centres of Excellence Impact Project
Effect: Government will shortly access Twelve Million US Dollars (US$12,000,000), for infrastructure and capacity development.
Sentence: <e1>Under the African Centres of Excellence Impact Project</e1>, <e2>Government will shortly access Twelve Million US Dollars (US$12,000,000), for infrastructure and capacity development.</e2>
